BusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: URBAN ACADEMY OF GREATER PITTSBURGH CHARTER SCHOOL

IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: OPERATING AN ELEMENTARY SCHOOL - KINDERGARTEN THROUGH FIFTH GRADE
IRS990.MissionDesc: OPERATING AN ELEMENTARY SCHOOL - KINDERGARTEN THROUGH FIFTH GRADE
IRS990.Desc: A CHARTER SCHOOL THAT PROVIDES SUPERIOR EDUCATION AND DEVELOPS ACADEMIC EXCELLENCE, LEADERSHIP SKILLS, AND SOCIAL VALUES IN A MODEL SCHOOL LEARNING ENVIRONMENT FOR OVER 340 CHILDREN

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE INTERNAL REVENUE SERVICE HAS GRANTED THE SCHOOL TAX-EXEMPT STATUS PURSUANT TO SECTION 501(C)(3) OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE, AS OTHER THAN A PRIVATE FOUNDATION, IN A LETTER DATED SEPTEMBER 16, 1998; THEREFORE, NO EXPENSE HAS BEEN RECOGNIZED FOR INCOME TAXES IN THE ACCOMPANYING FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. FURTHER, THE SCHOOL ANNUALLY FILES A FORM 990. THE FORMS FILED ARE SUBJECT TO EXAMINATION BY THE INTERNAL REVENUE SERVICE GENERALLY FOR THREE YEARS AFTER THEY ARE FILED.
AS OF THIS FILING, THE AUDIT OF THE REPORTING YEAR IS UNDERWAY BUT IS NOT COMPLETE AND THE REPORT HAS NOT BEEN ISSUED.
AS OF THIS FILING, THE AUDIT OF THE REPORTING YEAR IS UNDERWAY BUT IS NOT COMPLETE AND THE REPORT HAS NOT BEEN ISSUED.
THE NONDISCRIMINATION STATEMENT IS ON ALL PRINTED BROCHURES AND ON THE LITERATURE FOR SPECIAL EDUCATION OUTREACHED TO THE GENERAL COMMUNITY.
AS A PUBLIC SCHOOL, THE ORGANIZATION RECEIVES REVENUE FROM LOCAL, STATE, AND FEDERAL SOURCES.
THE SCHOOL IS NOT SUBJECT TO THE SPECIFIC PUBLISHING REQUIREMENTS OF REV. PROC. 75-50, 1975 CB, PAGE 587, AS LONG AS IT IS OPERATING UNDER A CONTRACT WITH A LOCAL GOVERNMENT.

TaxExemptBondsIssuesGrp.PurposeDesc: ACQUISITION OF BUILDING IN WHICH SCHOOL IS SITUATED

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section A, Line 8b
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE OFFICIAL COMMITTEES CONSIST OF THE EXECUTIVE, HUMAN RESOURCES, FACILITIES, AND FINANCE. NONE OF THE COMMITTEES HAVE THE AUTHORITY TO ACT ON BEHALF OF THE GOVERNING BOARD.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 11b
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FORM 990 IS DISTRIBUTED TO BOARD MEMBERS FOR REVIEW BEFORE IT IS FILE. BOARD MEMBERS CAN MAKE COMMENTS PRIOR TO FILING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 12c
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE SCHOOL MAINTAINS AND FILES EACH SIGNED DISCLOSURE AND A BOARD COMMITTEE REVIEWS ALL DISCLOSURES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE HUMAN RESOURCES COMMITTEE AND THE BOARD CHAIRPERSON PERFORM ANNUAL EVALUATIONS OF PERFORMANCE AND REVIEW SALARY COMPARISONS TO DETERMINE AN APPROPRIATE SALARY ADJUSTMENT. THE BOARD CHAIRPERSON THEN DISCUSSES THE SALARY RECOMMENDED BY THE COMMITTEE WITH THE EMPLOYEE AND THE ARRANGEMENT IS EXECUTED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, Line 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: DOCUMENTS ARE MADE AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST.

ReasonableCauseExplanation.ExplanationTxt: THE PREPARER DID NOT FILE THE EXTENSION TIMELY.
